00334    #if UTIL_MPI
00335    /*
00336    * Pack an object of type T into send buffer.
00337    */
00338    template <typename T>
00339    void Buffer::pack(const T& data)
00340    {
00341       if (sendPtr_ + sizeof(data) > sendBufferEnd_) {
00342          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send buffer");
00343       }
00344       T* ptr = (T *)sendPtr_;
00345       *ptr = data;
00346       ++ptr;
00347       sendPtr_ = (char *)ptr;
00348    }
00349 
00350    /*
00351    * Unpack an object of type T from recvBuffer.
00352    */
00353    template <typename T>
00354    void Buffer::unpack(T& data)
00355    {
00356       if (recvPtr_ + sizeof(data) > recvBufferEnd_) {
00357          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of recv buffer");
00358       }
00359       T* ptr = (T *)recvPtr_;
00360       data = *ptr;
00361       ++ptr;
00362       recvPtr_ = (char *)ptr;
00363    }
00364 
00365    /*
00366    * Pack a Group.
00367    */
00368    template <int N>
00369    void Buffer::packGroup(const Group<N>& group)
00370    {
00371       // Preconditions
00372       if (sendType_ != GROUP) {
00373          UTIL_THROW("SendType is not GROUP");
00374       }
00375       if (sendGroupSize_ != N) {
00376          UTIL_THROW("Wrong sendGroupSize");
00377       }
00378       pack<int>(group.id());
00379       pack<int>(group.typeId());
00380       for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
00381          pack<int>(group.atomId(j));
00382       }
00383       pack<unsigned int>(group.plan().flags());
00384 
00385       //Increment number of groups in send buffer by 1
00386       ++sendSize_;
00387    }
00388 
00389    /*
00390    * Unpack the next Group in the recieve buffer.
00391    */
00392    template <int N>
00393    void Buffer::unpackGroup(Group<N>& group)
00394    {
00395       // Preconditions
00396       if (recvType_ != GROUP) {
00397          UTIL_THROW("SendType is not GROUP");
00398       }
00399       if (recvGroupSize_ != N) {
00400          UTIL_THROW("Wrong recvGroupSize");
00401       }
00402       int i;
00403       unpack(i);
00404       group.setId(i);
00405       unpack(i);
00406       group.setTypeId(i);
00407       for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j) {
00408          unpack(i);
00409          group.setAtomId(j, i);
00410          group.clearAtomPtr(j);
00411       }
00412 
00413       // Unpack communication plan
00414       unsigned int ui;
00415       unpack(ui);
00416       group.plan().setFlags(ui);
00417 
00418       // Decrement number of groups in recv buffer by 1
00419       recvSize_--;
00420    }
00421    #endif
00422 
00423 }
00424 #endif
